name: [DEMO] Super Simple 2D Space Shooter
description:
In this competitive party game, you are encouraged to challenge your 

friends and family to a duel of shooting, movement, and strategy.

Hide behind asteroids and zero in on your enemies. 

CONTROLS:

Player 1 Controls:

W/A/S/D = Move

F/G = Turn

Y = Shoot

Player 2 Controls:

⬆/⬅/⬇/➡ = Move

,/. = Turn

Right Shift or Control = Shoot

NOTE: This is a demo of the full version of the game.

NOTE: Sorry, but for now this is only available for windows!

Skip the wait for the HTML version and download it now!
